diff: +	int x = rect.x + rect.width - marginWidth - highlight;
+			leftSize = topLeft.computeSize(x - rect.x - marginWidth - highlight, SWT.DEFAULT);

members.signatureBeforeChange: Point layout (Composite composite, boolean move, int x, int y, int width, int height, boolean flushCache)
members.signatureAfterChange: Point layout (Composite composite, boolean move, int x, int y, int width, int height, boolean flushCache)
diff: +	if (numColumns < 1) return new Point (marginLeft + marginWidth * 2 + marginRight, marginTop + marginHeight * 2 + marginBottom);
+	int availableWidth = width - horizontalSpacing * (columnCount - 1) - (marginLeft + marginWidth * 2 + marginRight);
+	int availableHeight = height - verticalSpacing * (rowCount - 1) - (marginTop + marginHeight * 2 + marginBottom);
